plot.description: A plot to annotate genomic coordinates

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points

fontcolor.description: A character value indicating the color for text

linecolor.description: A character value indicating the color ofthe genome label axis

margin.description: A numeric or unit vector specifying space between axisand coordinate labels

scale.description: A character value indicating the scale of the coordinatesalong the genome label

commas.description: A logical value indicating whether to include commas instart and stop labels

sequence.description: A logical value indicating whether to include sequenceinformation above the label of an x-axis (only at appropriate resolutions)

boxWidth.description: A numeric value indicating the width of the boxesrepresenting sequence information at appropriate resolutions

axis.description: A character value indicating along which axis toadd genome label

at.description: A numeric vector of x-value locations for tick marks

tcl.description: A numeric specifying the length of tickmarks as a fraction oftext height

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying genome label x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b" combinedwith a numeric value specifying genome label y-location

just.description: Justification of genome label relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x} or \code{y} are only given as numerics

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters

....description: Additional grid graphical parameters or digit specifications
